alert.note: Alert for Norfolk; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 6:36PM EST until January 14 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Connecticut... Connecticut River At Middle Haddam affecting Middlesex County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Massachusetts...Rhode Island...Connecticut...New Hampshire... Neponset River At Norwood affecting Suffolk and Norfolk Counties. Wood River At Hope Valley affecting Washington County. Farmington River At Simsbury affecting Hartford County. Assabet River At Maynard affecting Worcester and Middlesex Counties. Sudbury River At Saxonville affecting Middlesex County. Nashua River At East Pepperell affecting Worcester, Middlesex and Hillsborough Counties. Concord River At Lowell affecting Middlesex County. Shawsheen River At Andover affecting Essex County. Charles River At Dover affecting Middlesex and Norfolk Counties. Pawtuxet River At Cranston affecting Kent and Providence Counties. Pawcatuck River At Wood River Junction affecting Washington County. Pawcatuck River At Westerly affecting Washington and New London Counties. Taunton River Near Bridgewater affecting Bristol and Plymouth Counties. For the Farmington River...including Unionville, Simsbury, Tariffville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Assabet River...including Maynard...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Concord River...including Lowell...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Shawsheen River...including Wilmington, Andover...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Charles River...including Dover...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Neponset River...including Norwood...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pawtuxet River...including Scituate Reservoir, Cranston... Major flooding is forecast. For the Pawcatuck River...including Wood River Junction, Westerly... Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Taunton River...including Bridgewater...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Wood River...including Hope Valley...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neponset River at Norwood. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding occurs along the Neponset River in Norwood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.0 feet tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1230 AM EST.
